BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Lynne D. Richardson, M.D. to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment to the Board of Health, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 553 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Lynne D. Richardson, M.D.,  Board of Health

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Jeffrey Kay to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment to the Taxi and Limousine Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 2301 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Jeffrey Kay, Taxi and Limousine Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Susan Hinkson to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the Board of Standards and Appeals, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 659 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Susan Hinkson, Board of Standards and Appeals

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Dara Ottley-Brown to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the Board of Standards and Appeals, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 659 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dara Ottley-Brown, Board of Standards and Appeals

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

John Maese, M.D., Council candidate for re-designation and subsequent re-appointment by the Mayor to the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors, and serve for the remainder of a five-year term that will expire on March 20, 2011.  Dr. Maese is a resident of Brooklyn.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: John Maese, M.D., NYC Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors

Items.Title: Anna Kril, Council candidate for designation and subsequent appointment by the Mayor to the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors to fill a vacant position, and serve for the remainder of a five-year term that will expire on March 20, 2010.  Ms. Kril is a resident of Queens.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Anna Kril, NYC Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Lynne D. Richardson, M.D. to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment to the Board of Health, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 553 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
